mapper.select: SELECT C.*, COUNT(CM.certId) AS extra__certCount FROM certMention CM JOIN certificate C ON CM.certId = C.id WHERE (#{jobCatId} = 0 OR CM.jobCatId = #{jobCatId}) AND (#{jobCodeId} = 0 OR CM.jobCodeId = #{jobCodeId}) GROUP BY CM.certId ORDER BY extra__certCount DESC LIMIT 7;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO memberCert SET memberId = #{memberId}, certId = #{certId}, certname = #{certName}, certificateNumber = #{certificateNumber}, startDate = #{startDate}, endDate = #{endDate}, regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT id, `name` FROM certificate WHERE `name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY LENGTH(`name`) ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT id, `name`, extra__jobCatMentionCount FROM (SELECT t.jobCatId AS `id`, jCat.name AS `name`, t.cnt AS extra__jobCatMentionCount, 0 AS sort_order FROM (SELECT jobCatId, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM certMention GROUP BY jobCatId ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT 4) AS t JOIN jobCat jCat ON jCat.id = t.jobCatId UNION ALL SELECT 00000 AS `id`, '기타' AS `name`, COUNT(*) AS extra__jobCatMentionCount, 1 AS sort_order FROM certMention WHERE jobCatId NOT IN (SELECT jobCatId FROM (SELECT jobCatId FROM certMention GROUP BY jobCatId ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 4) AS top_ids)) AS combined ORDER BY sort_order ASC, extra__jobCatMentionCount DESC;
